Trade/Device Name(s): FARRZYME Human High Avidity Anti-dsDNA Enzyme Immunoassay Kit
Analyte(s): IgG autoantibodies against double stranded deoxyribonucleic acid (dsDNA)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for FARRZYME Human High Avidity Anti-dsDNA Enzyme Immunoassay Kit for detection of anti-dsDNA autoantibodies in serum as an aid in diagnosing SLE
Indications for Use Summary: In-vitro measurement of specific, high avidity IgG autoantibodies against dsDNA in human serum as an aid to the diagnosis of systemic lupus erythematosus, in conjunction with other serological tests and clinical findings
